00006 dds::DomainParticipant::DomainParticipant() 
00007 {
00008   DDS::DomainParticipantFactory_var dpf =
00009     DDS::DomainParticipantFactory::get_instance();
00010   
00011   Assert::postcondition((dpf.in() != 0), 
00012                         "Unable to get DomainParticipantFactory",
00013                         __FILE__);
00014   
00015   DDS::DomainParticipant* dp = 
00016     dpf->create_participant(0,
00017                             PARTICIPANT_QOS_DEFAULT, 
00018                             0, 
00019                             DDS::ANY_STATUS);
00020   
00021   Assert::postcondition((dp != 0), 
00022                         "Unable to get DomainParticipant", 
00023                         __FILE__);
00024 
00025   SIMD_LOG(SIMD_ALLOC, "Created Participant at: " << std::hex << dp << std::dec);
00026   this->reset(dp, dds::mem::DPDeleter());
00027 }
